nodes.text: Ep Gart was a brash, small-time criminal based out of Mos Zabu, on Tatooine, during the Galactic Civil War. Planning to sell a load of Nergon-14 to an Imperial officer, his plans were thwarted when Domo Jones and his associate Blerx caused a herd of nerfs to stampede the location of the sale. Gart was killed when he tried to catch Domo, only to find himself flying into the gaping mouth of a sarlacc in the Sarlacc fields.
